text: <@UDDJG2VFG> I'm running into the same issue. Can you help?

HI all - weird thing happening seemingly out of nowhere but when I try to add a new portal to my local by running `hs auth personalaccesskey` the CLI prompts me to enter my personal access key (as expected) but when I do, it doesn't ask me to enter a name for the environment (like it used to) it just responds with `[SUCCESS] HubSpot.config.yml created with Personal Access Key.` - also my HubSpot.config.yml is nowhere to be found in the local filesystem :thinking_face: anyone else experiencing this? <@UDDJG2VFG> <@URWEFV44E>
Admittedly running v 1.1.7 of the CLI and using node v12.10.0 (npm v6.10.3)
